Attributes.description: Literary engagements with modernity in the Spanish Americas, from the 1820's to the present. Includes civilization, progress, politicization, and violence.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: SPAN 221. (; and SPAN 301 or equivalent expertise in written and spoken Spanish.)
